formula: a(n) ~ (2*n-1)! / r^(2*n), where r = 0.8121639902962354379596899348276590246... is the root of the equation tan(r)*arcsin(r) = 1. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 05 2015
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Prepended missing a(0)=0 from _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 05 2015
